WordPress

WordPress is a content management system (CMS) that gives you the ability to create and easily maintain complex websites. WordPress is open source which means anyone can install it on their system and spin up a website for the absolute price of FREE in minutes. WordPress often times gets confused with the blogging platform but it is a separate

How Popular Is WordPress?

WordPress powers about 43% of the websites on the internet, it is hands down the most popular way of creating a website and for some very good reasons. Below you'll find a few of those reason.

WordPress Is Easy To Use Especially For Beginers

One of the main reasons WordPress is so generally popular is because of it's easy to use interface. The intuitive interface makes creating webpages and customizing them effortless. Thanks to features like WordPress Plugins & Themes anyone with a little know how and some patience can have a website up and running in minutes.

WordPress Plugins Make Adding Complex Features To Your Website Easy

What is a WordPress plugin? WordPress Plugins are additional chunks of code that add fucntionality to your website. This extra code can be added to your website with just a few simple clicks. WordPress Plugins give you the ability to add things like contact forms, forums, sign s in features and even an online store.

WordPress Themes Get Your Website Looking Right

What are WordPress Themes? WordPress Themes very much like WordPress Plugins are additional pieces of code you can add to your website to imporove it's appearance. WordPress Themes can give you professional Grade look to your website and save you a few hundred dollars in design work.

Theirs A Lot of Free WordPress Resources Online

One of the added benefits of picking WordPress to power your website is it's popularity. Because almost half of the website online are ran on WordPress this means people almost half of the internet has ran into a very siliar problem you may be having and a lot of those people have made content regarding your problem.

Why You Should Not Use WordPress

Their aren't too many drawbacks to WordPress, I mean it's very popular for a reasons. But despite it's popularity thiers is a few things you should consider when using wordpress
